Clients recognize us as as 'Talent Connectors and the President is a People Person'. Be they Temporary, Temp to Hire, or Direct Hire (Permanent) Personnel, we fill jobs primarily in Queens and Manhattan.  Some clients are in Brooklyn, the Bronx, Nassau and Westchester. business_description: McGeown Associates LLC. is a Woman Owned Small Business (WOSB) specializing in development of 21st century clean energy systems that combine renewable energy smart grids, storage, and conventional generation.  We are driven by a conviction that universal access to clean and reliable energy is key to improving the health and well-being of people around the world. It strengthens livelihoods and bolsters local economies.  Our mission is to support governments to design and implement Clean Energy strategies that ensure citizens have access to reliable energy resources that are clean, safe, and affordable 24x7.   MCGA's core principles are embedded in our tagline 'Stewardship and Integrity'.  We believe that we have an absolute obligation to use the planet's resources wisely for future generations.   We believe that climate change is an existential threat to our future that requires urgent action, but the US has the capability to respond quickly and build a more resilient, sustainable economy.  We also live by standards of integrity to serve our clients with unquestioned honest and impartial advice.  The firm is internationally recognized in implementing resilient clean energy programs for governments and utilities.  MCGA focuses on opportunities that combine financing and technology to help develop new applications for distributed generation, smart grids, storage, renewable energy and energy efficiency.   Recent engagements include the US Army, US Department of Energy, US Air Force, US Virgin Islands, Belize and Puerto Rico. C+GA brings our experience working on many successful projects to house educational, social service, cultural, training, office, residential and community programs throughout the City of New York.  Whether the project is a new building, a rehabilitation, or a planning study, we help each client realize a design that enables them to serve their mission. Our thoughtful design process places special emphasis on analyzing the clientâs goals, both functional and aesthetic, the site, the program, and the budget, to create a design solution that serves the needs of the client and the projectâs users, while also considering the broader community and the environment. Each project begins with a conversation that continues throughout the design process, as we listen carefully to the client and stakeholders to understand priorities and concerns to create the best possible project. We avidly pursue design excellence, and our work reflects our commitment to quality and to ensuring that each project serves its immediate users and its surrounding community. C+GA views Urban Design, Master Planning and Preservation as an extension of our architectural practice, and thus design with careful attention to the large scale, analysis and detailing that these projects introduce. The firm has made a significant commitment to sustainable design, with experience in LEED and Passive House design. Our leadership in sustainable multi-family design is recognized nationally, as we are among the Engineering News-Recordâs (ENR) 2020 Top 100 Green Building Design Firms, ranked  on the Building Design + Construction 2021 top 160 architecture firms, along with the top 150 architecture, engineering, and construction firms in the higher education sector, and won the 2021 Ivory for Housing Affordability in Construction and Design. In addition, we have taken a lead role in the architecture communityâs resiliency efforts following Hurricane Sandy, working with municipalities, public agencies, developers, and civic groups to build more resilient communities. Chiaraâs appreciation for interior design sparked while traveling between New York City and Italy during her childhood. Her first career at Vogue magazine, where she worked as an editor and stylist, allowed Chiara to seamlessly transition to interiors, working at such design firms as Molly Isaksen Interiors, Nickey Kehoe, and Suzanne Rheinstein.  During this time, she gained invaluable experience and exposure to a vast resource of internationally acclaimed craftsmen, artists and dealers.  Whether designing a celebrityâs home in the Hollywood Hills, a polished Upper East Side apartment, a contemporary urban loft, corporate offices in both New York city and Los Angeles, an all womenâs membership club, retail stores or several upscale city restaurants, Chiara de Rege delivers unparalleled service and superior design acumen.  All of her projects share a timeless sensibility brought to life with a mix of modern and traditional furnishings -- many custom-designed for each project. Chiara often goes well beyond the normal scope, by designing custom stationary, linens, amenities, dinnerware, flatware and libraries, and also works extensively on branding concept and design for each of her commercial projects. (RVB+A), founded in 1979, is a Transportation Planning and Engineering Consulting firm dedicated to the planning, design, research and development of transit vehicles and transportation systems. Our dedicated professionals are committed to delivering superior services that efficiently satisfy the client requirements. Some of the services provided in the areas related to transit vehicles are: design and engineering, quality control and quality assurance, testing and commissioning, system integration, technical writing, specification development, industrial design, safety and security, communication systems.   In the area of Transportation Systems, RVB+Aâs experience covers a wide broad range of services, from feasibility studies to systems implementation, operations, maintenance and management. Our company has proven success providing services such as: research and development; system planning and feasibility studies; economic assessments and cost estimates; technology assessments; public/private partnerships; operations and maintenance planning and implementation; construction management of vehicles and rail infrastructure; contract administration and regulatory services; procurement processes and  negotiations; market demand forecasting for products and systems; life cycle cost analysis; government relations; institutional issues; project management; as well as performance simulations and assessments. business_description: Although only recently packaged and sold, the history of Pisqueya is a rich one dating back to 1986. The first batches of our hot sauce were born in the heart of Brooklyn, from a recipe passed down through a family of Dominican cooks.  Just like the sauce, Maritza Abreu, the founder of Pisqueya, was born in NYC but has roots in the Caribbean. Her parents came from the Dominican Republic and worked tirelessly to open their restaurant, Puerto Viejo, where Brooklnites could enjoy the flavors of Dominican cuisine, including the familyâs hot sauce recipe. After 22 years of serving delicious food to the neighborhood, the Abreu family lost their restaurant to a fire, taking the hot sauce with it.  A year and a half later, the family banded together to reinvent Puerto Viejo in a changing Brooklyn and were met with open arms by the neighbors who had supported them throughout the years. Maritza noticed, however, that their customers not only missed their food, but the sauce too, and she decided to create Pisqueya to bottle and share their special island flavor beyond the neighborhood.   Martiza now personally oversees the creation of the sauce that loyal customers have been pouring on everything for more than three decades. In the process of bringing Pisqueya to life, she has created two new recipes- a milder take on the original and a tropical spicy sweet twist. All three varieties have a two-year shelf life, are vegan, kosher, gluten and preservative free and low in sodium. Pisqueya believes that quality, authenticity and flavor should never be compromised, and we invite you to share that with us!

business_description: At Renew'd For Life we practice a holistic approach to health and wellness, which means that we look at how all areas of the person's life are connected. Does stress on job or in your relationship(s) cause overeating? Does lack of sleep or low energy prevent you from exercising? As we work together, we will look at how all parts of connected life affect health as a whole.  We work with clients to get in touch with their body's needs because we understand that life happens, and needs will change. We want to equip people with the self-awareness to make the best decisions in any given circumstance. We believe each person is fully capable of making well-informed decisions as their own expert, not the latest magazine article or fad diet book.  We use assessment tools to assist the client to define what they value most. We'll use these visions to motivate specific goals that bring them closer to where they want to be. As a health and wellness coach, we will not dictate a diet, but together we will explore why some foods make you feel better than others and how to strategically use that feedback. Together weÂ¿ll co-create your health goals within reasonable time frames and actionable objectives, so you know exactly what you're working toward.  Clients seek RenewÂ¿d services for several reasons:  Statistics show: Chronic conditions like obesity, hypertension, and diabetes are present in our population at unacceptably high and costly levels. More than 78 million American adults are obese, and more than 1 in 20 is extremely obese. About 70 million U.S. adults have hypertension with only 52 percent having the condition under control. Just over 29 million Americans have diabetes and an additional 86 million have prediabetes. The medical costs of these conditions are staggering Â¿ an estimated yearly total of $147 billion for obesity, $42 billion for hypertension, and $245 billion for diabetes.     One of the successful and under-utilized remedies for this these conditions is behavior change in the form of dietary and/or activity modifications. Behavior change is hard, however RenewÂ¿d makes behavior change easier health and wellness coaching. We teach, coach, support, follow-up and maintain.

business_description: Bradford Edwards & Varlack LLP performs as a business advisory organization rather than a traditional law firm. We recognize that clientsâ problems are layered and require integrated solutions whether they are legal, commercial, financial, or their liberty is at risk. We have assembled a diverse team with different talents, experiences and skills who stand ready to tackle clientsâ problems. We are obsessed with winning, and aggressively advocate for our clients through rigorous analysis balanced against commercial, political and strategic realities.  We put our clientsâ interests first. We set clear goals at the outset of an engagement and work with clients to define âsuccessâ and then deploy resources efficiently and innovatively to minimize disruption to their businesses. We offer pre-litigation counseling and advice and seek a consensual resolution, if appropriate. From the outset of each engagement, however, we prepare as if the investigation or dispute will be resolved in an adversarial proceeding before a court, a regulatory proceeding, or an arbitration panel. We train our sights on the critical facts and issues that matter most to our clients at trial rather than pre-trial machinations to gain leverage.  Select Practice Areas: - Insolvency and Creditorâs Rights. Our attorneys have represented creditors in Chapter 11 proceedings, including lenders, bondholders, trade creditors and equity holders; helped distressed companies sell assets; defended creditors in fraudulent conveyance and preferential transfers actions; and investigated breach of fiduciary duty and fraud claims, as well as subordination of claims and priority disputes. - Investigations and Government Enforcement Defense. We have deep experience representing clients in civil proceedings before federal, state and city regulatory agencies on a range of issues including antitrust, accounting restatements, fraud, and FCPA matters. - Securities Enforcement & Regulatory. Our lawyers leverage their experience at federal and state regulatory agencies to advise clients about financial products and services litigation that accompany industrywide inquiries. - Trials, Arbitrations and Mediation. Our lawyers have extensive litigation experience in state and federal courts nationwide. - Employment Counseling and Litigation. We have led internal investigations, defended claims of discrimination, sexual harassment and wrongful termination, and prepared severance agreements for clients. We also provide guidance on talent management strategies designed to mitigate risk. - Risk and Crisis Management. Our attorneys focus on risk and crisis management to mitigate litigation and reputational risk. We advise boards of directors and management teams on reputation management and managing public perception and help to craft clientsâ media strategy.

business_description: Vanity Beauty Bar Brooklyn is a full-service nail salon.   We've created a space where you can enjoy your salon experience. From the moment you enter our salon, we want you to feel right at home.   With pride in our quality of service, we have carefully selected our team of passionate Nail Bae's that are committed to providing only the best quality service.  Vanity Beauty Bar is a full-service nail salon which was originally formed in 2017. We had dreams of becoming business owners and to begin our path of entrepreneurship. However, those dreams were halted due to circumstances beyond our control. In May of 2017, just days before our initial grand opening date, we were sidelined by a fire that began in the cellar, which quickly spread upward from the basement and into the salon. The fire led to several other barriers along the way. We have always put our trust in God and believe that everything truly happens for a reason.   Fast forward to the present, after several years of patiently waiting, and finally receiving clearance from the City to occupy the space were were impacted once again, due to the corona-virus pandemic.   As most restrictions have now been lifted. Vanity Beauty Bar Brooklyn is finally ready to reach new milestones and achievements, in conjunction with all safety and health guidelines implemented by the State of New York.  It has been a rough, long and hard-fought journey with a lot of lessons learned throughout the process. We are delighted to begin service the Flatbush neighborhood of Brooklyn!

Through the facilitation of innovative social justice programming and events, we primarily serve community members who are marginalized and ousted from traditional models of care through peer-to-peer counseling support, ancestral healing circles, and comprehensive healing & social justice education.   BGR has two major practice areas including offering free and accessible community healing programs and expert racial, gender and healing justice consultation for community-based organizations.  BGR guides organizations to transform outdated work culture by developing an explicit commitment to anti-oppression and anti-oppressive practices. Our facilitators guide community members to center their mental health and healing by providing free and accessible healing spaces that use storytelling as a tool for communication.   BGR facilitators offer large-scale facilitation + consultation services including political educational offerings that build the tools and competencies for anti-oppression, community accountability, feminisms, race + racism, and healing justice.
